content: this is a super easy 1 hour project and it s customizable and this pattern has been tested this is a 2 in 1 pattern with two cats to make these cats also make good buddies materials any yarn color you would like for your kitty black or pink for the mouth 4 0mm hook or 3 5mm hook safety eyes size is your choice i like to use one color any to embroider around the eyes but its optional stuffing stitch marker scissors needle abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase increase chain chain round s round s 5dc bobble 5 double_crochet bobble decrease decrease the cats you can make from this pattern are one color cat siamese cat have fun crocheting
